Seven Two Charlie

Flight training in the classic style.

Experience Stick and Rudder Flying with a Modern Twist

At Seven Two Charlie aviation, we offer you an unparalleled opportunity for flight training in a beautiful, hangared, vintage tailwheel airplane. Our flight training program is uniquely designed to combine the classic feel of stick and rudder flying with the reliability and advancements of modern aviation technology.

Why Choose a Vintage Tailwheel Airplane?

Authentic Stick and Rudder Experience
Master the art of flying with a direct, hands-on approach that connects you with the aircraft in a way that tricycle gear airplanes can't match.
Ideal for Short Fields and Grass Runways
Tailwheel airplanes excel in short-field operations, giving you the versatility to explore more remote and rustic airstrips.

State-of-the-Art Equipment

Vintage doesn't have to mean outdated. N3472C is equipped with the latest navigational, communication, and transponder technology to ensure a safe and efficient flying experience.

Garmin 650 Nav/Comm:
Touch-screen, WAAS, GPS nav/comm ensures precise and reliable navigation on every flight.
Garmin 275 Attitude Indicator + HSI:
Experience enhanced situational awareness with these cutting-edge flight instruments, combining traditional pilotage with modern digital displays and built-in battery backup.
Garmin GTX 345 Transponder
A fully modern transponder with ADS-B in and out.
IFR Capability:
Our tailwheel airplanes are equipped for Instrument Flight Rules (IFR) flying, allowing you to train in a wider range of weather conditions and scenarios.

What Training is Available?

You've finished your primary training and you're a private pilot. Now you're ready to take the next steps in your avation journey, including:

  • Tailwheel endorsement
  • Instrument pilot
  • Commercial pilot
  • CFI
  • ... and beyond
